description: Please scan the printed QR code to start ordering.
manuallyTableCodeDescription: Please enter the 6 digit Table code written on the card at the table to continue
tableNotFoundDescription: Please try scanning the Table code again or enter the table code manually if that doesn’t work

tableCodeNotFoundInUrlMsg: Please scan QR code from the table using your device.
